content.shipping: We ship orders within 2–4 business days. Delivery times depend on your region and the selected shipping method.
content.cost: Shipping cost is calculated at checkout based on your location and order size.
content.returns: You can return unused products within 30 days of delivery in their original packaging.
content.process: To initiate a return, please contact our support team. Refunds are issued within 5–7 business days after receiving the returned product.
